name: Bottle Shoot Training
description:
Bottle Shoot Training is a 3d bottle shooting game fully loaded with range shooting, target shooting and outdoor shooting. The bottle game has various shooting targets, shoot the target, smash glass and become a target shooter. Break the glass with your expert shooting skills and tag yourself as sharp shooter in this long range shooting arena. So get ready for bottle shooting challenge.


How to Play
- Aim and smash the bottle
- Be accurate while shooting
- Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
- Move left & right to shoot more bottles
- Shoot to win

Highlights:
Best FPS Gaming Experience
Realistic Weapons
Challenging Training Ranges
Top Quality Graphics
